import './Skills.css' import Code from './Code/Code' import Admin from './Admin/Admin' import Agile from './Agile/Agile' // import Cyber from './Cyber/Cyber' import Databases from './Databases/Databases' import Git from './Git/Git' import Terminal from './Terminal/Terminal' import Testing from './Testing/Testing' import Web from './Web/Web' import Tabs from './Tabs' const DesktopView = `
` const MobileView = `
hi
` const setMobileView = (html) => { const nav = document.querySelector() } const Skills = () => { const mql = window.matchMedia('(max-width: 750px)') let mobileView = mql.matches return ( { if(mobileView) { setMobileView(DesktopView) } } ) /* code shell git agile testing sharepoint data admin api */ } export default Skills
